casebody.data:
First Department,

January, 1975

(January 6, 1975) In the Matter of Jerry Greene, Petitioner, v. Arnold G. Fraiman, as a Justice of the Supreme Court of the State of New York, County of New York, Respondent.

Application in the nature of mandamus unanimously denied and the petition dismissed, without costs and without disbursements, without prejudice to a further application by the petitioner for reinstatement of bail pursuant to CPL 530.60. No opinion. Concur — Murphy, J. P., Lupiano, Tilzer, Capozzoli and Lane, JJ.
